fields.prompt: How would you rate your knowledge on this text's topic ?
fields.prompt_en: How would you rate your knowledge on this text's topic ?

fields.prompt: Can you understand the question ?
fields.prompt_en: Can you understand the question ?

fields.prompt: How interesting do you think the question is ?
fields.prompt_en: How interesting do you think the question is ?

fields.prompt: How curious are you about knowing the answer to this question ?
fields.prompt_en: How curious are you about knowing the answer to this question ?

fields.prompt: Do you think this question is fun ?
fields.prompt_en: Do you think this question is fun ?

fields.prompt: Can you give an overall score for this question ?
fields.prompt_en: Can you give an overall score for this question ?

fields.prompt: Do you think this question can be understoof by a 10-year old ?
fields.prompt_en: Do you think this question can be understoof by a 10-year old ?

fields.prompt: Do you think this question would be interesting for a 10-year old ?
fields.prompt_en: Do you think this question would be interesting for a 10-year old ?

fields.prompt: Do you think this question could be offensive for a 10-year old?
fields.prompt_en: Do you think this question could be offensive for a 10-year old?

fields.prompt: How important do you think is answering this question to better understand the text ?
fields.prompt_en: How important do you think is answering this question to better understand the text ?
fields.annotations: Not at all important~Not important~Medium~Important~Very Important
fields.annotations_en: Not at all important~Not important~Medium~Important~Very Important

fields.prompt: How closely related to the central idea of the text do you think this question is ?
fields.prompt_en: How closely related to the central idea of the text do you think this question is ?
fields.annotations: Not at all related~Not related~Medium~Related~Super related
fields.annotations_en: Not at all related~Not related~Medium~Related~Super related

fields.prompt: Do you thin the answer to this question is :
fields.prompt_en: Do you thin the answer to this question is :
fields.annotations: Explicitly stated in the text~Not explicitly stated in the text but can be implied from the text~Not at all stated in the text
fields.annotations_en: Explicitly stated in the text~Not explicitly stated in the text but can be implied from the text~Not at all stated in the text

fields.prompt: Do you think the answer to this question :
fields.prompt_en: Do you think the answer to this question :
fields.annotations: Offers new information related to a clear and specific part of the text~Offers new information related to the general context of the text~Offers new information that is not at all related to the text and its context~Does not offer new information
fields.annotations_en: Offers new information related to a clear and specific part of the text~Offers new information related to the general context of the text~Offers new information that is not at all related to the text and its context~Does not offer new information

fields.prompt: Do you think this question :
fields.prompt_en: Do you think this question :
fields.annotations: Has a declarative construction~Has the questionning word in the middle~Has no subject-verb inversion~Has a proper interrogative syntax: questionning word at the beginning + subject-verb inversion
fields.annotations_en: Has a declarative construction~Has the questionning word in the middle~Has no subject-verb inversion~Has a proper interrogative syntax: questionning word at the beginning + subject-verb inversion

fields.prompt: The questionning word used in this question is :
fields.prompt_en: The questionning word used in this question is :

fields.prompt: Do you think we could answer this question with a simple fact ?
fields.prompt_en: Do you think we could answer this question with a simple fact ?

fields.prompt: Do you think answering this question resquires explaining a relationship / a mechanism ?
fields.prompt_en: Do you think answering this question resquires explaining a relationship / a mechanism ?

fields.prompt: Do you think this question is trivial ?
fields.prompt_en: Do you think this question is trivial ?

fields.prompt: Do you think this question is meaningful ?
fields.prompt_en: Do you think this question is meaningful ?

fields.prompt: Who do you think asked this question ?
fields.prompt_en: Who do you think asked this question ?
fields.annotations: A child: 5-10 years old~An other child: 10-15 years old~A young adult: 15-20 years old~An adult : >20 years old~Other : a machine
fields.annotations_en: A child: 5-10 years old~An other child: 10-15 years old~A young adult: 15-20 years old~An adult : >20 years old~Other : a machine
